headline: Assessing Eli Lilly (LLY) Valuation After Recent Choppy Trading And GLP 1 Growth Expectations
summary: Stock performance context for Eli Lilly (LLY) Eli Lilly (LLY) has drawn fresh attention after recent price moves, with the share closing at $1,038.40.
